alert.note: Alert for Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 16 at 1:58PM PDT until April 17 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR PYRAMID LAKE... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TO 11 PM PDT MONDAY... * CHANGES...New wind advisory for Monday. * WHAT...For the Lake Wind Advisory today, west winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. Waves 1 to 3 feet. For the Wind Advisory for Monday, west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake. * WHEN...For the Lake Wind Advisory, until 8 PM PDT this evening. For the Wind Advisory, from 1 PM to 11 PM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...High profile vehicles may have difficulty along I-80, US-50, and US-95. Areas of blowing dust may bring localized visibility reductions.
info.instruction: Now is the time to secure loose outdoor items such as patio furniture and trash cans before winds increase which could blow these items away. The best thing to do is prepare ahead of time by making sure you have extra food and water on hand, flashlights with spare batteries and/or candles in the event of a power outage.

area.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
